title: Bed (Lit à la polonaise)
description: Bed (Lit à la polonaise); Unknown maker; Paris, France; about 1775 - 1780; Gessoed, gilded, and painted walnut; gilded iron; modern silk upholstery and passementerie; ostrich feathers; 302 × 179 × 226 cm (118 7/8 × 70 1/2 × 89 in.); 94.DA.72; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
